coverage_details.organ_transplant: Organ transplantation (Corneal, cultivation of Bone, Spinal, Heart, Liver, Kidney, Bone Marrow & Cochlear Implant), excluding the cost of the organ itself (Live organ cost). All joint replacement is covered, except Knee replacement is required for transfer to European central clinic (10 Cases Per year). Knee replacement received from Eastern region to be referred to 24330 Al Salam Hospital - Khobar (10 Cases Per year). All joint replacement is covered, except Knee replacement is required for transfer to European central clinic or Andalusia Hospital.
coverage_details.dental_general: Dental Scaling is covered twice a year
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00, all lens types are covered up to the optical limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for outpatient & in-patient services except for services with sub-limits. Medication limit equals pre-authorisation limit. Approval required where annual sub-limit exists.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Strepsils and Lozenges covered. Breathing machines and equipment if medically justified are covered. Blood Pressure or Diabetic Medicines/devices (including glucose readers with sensors) once per year. Disabled members’ medical equipment up to SAR 5,000 per member/year. SFDA/FDA non-registered medication covered if medically justified. Osteoarthritis treatments including injection covered. Pre-existing and chronic conditions covered. Accessories for insulin pump for 3 months covered. All vaccinations (including MOH/hajji/seasonal/any MOH requested/any age), psychiatric/nervous/psychological covered to annual limit. Intra-discal electro thermal therapy for lumbar disc, Chiropractic (if in KSA), speech/physiotherapy/occupational therapy. Epidural anesthesia (if requested); cryo cautery (not cosmetic); treatment of the handicapped (excluding cosmetic) to annual limit. Hyperbaric oxygen and all described medical therapies covered. Medically necessary complications from unapproved treatments covered. All eye surgeries except refractive correction; knee pain related injections and SFDA approved procedures, heart valve surgeries (including complications) covered to annual limit. Ambulance for emergencies/critical cases/post surgeries. Companion costs for all members. Home health care covered (annual limit, needs PRC approval). Allergy/disease/skin treatments as outlined. Vitamins and tonics for pregnant (deficiencies) only. Newborn covered on mother’s account for 60 days. Dental: scaling twice/year, flap surgery, abscesses, cysts, maxillofacial, hospitalization for dental falls under annual limit. Artificial limbs to maximum. Dressings, crutches, braces, pharma disposables, repatriation of remains SAR 10,000. Approval required for services with sub-limits. RTA, work hazards, and light sports covered as specified.

coverage_details.outpatient_deductible_mpn: Nil (except 20% up to 300 SR at Sulaiman Al Habib Hospitals outside Jeddah)
coverage_details.outpatient_deductible_hospitals: Nil (except 20% up to 300 SR at Sulaiman Al Habib Hospitals outside Jeddah)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Organ transplantation (Corneal, cultivation of Bone, Spinal, Heart, Liver, Kidney, Bone Marrow & Cochlear Implant), excluding the cost of the organ itself (Live organ cost). All joint replacement is covered, except Knee replacement is required for transfer to European central clinic (10 Cases Per year). Knee replacement received from Eastern region to be referred to 24330 Al Salam Hospital - Khobar (10 Cases Per year). All joint replacement is covered, except Knee replacement is required for transfer to European central clinic or Andalusia Hospital.
coverage_details.dental_general: Dental Scaling is covered twice a year
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00, all lens types are covered up to the optical limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for outpatient & in-patient services except for services with sub-limits. Approval is required for services with annual sub-limits. Medication limit equals pre-authorization limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Strepsils and Lozenges covered. Breathing machines and other medically needed equipment covered. Blood Pressure and diabetic devices including advanced glucose monitors (Freestyle, Dexcom), once per year. Medical equipment for disabled (up to SAR 5,000/member/year). SFDA/FDA non-registered drugs eligible if medically justified. Osteoarthritis (incl. injection) covered. Pre-existing and chronic treated. Accessories for insulin pump (3 months) covered. Vaccinations (all kinds) covered as per MOH or otherwise. Psychiatric/nervous/mental/psychological treatment to annual limit. Lumbar disc therapies and chiropractic (if in KSA). Speech/physiotherapy/occupational therapy. Epidural when needed; cryo cautery (non-cosmetic); handicapped non-cosmetic treatment. All appropriate medical therapies for serious/complex conditions including post-procedure complications. All eye surgeries except refractive correction. Knee pain/treatment injections (SFDA licensed), heart valve surgery/complications. Ambulance for emergencies/post-surgery. Companion costs for members and their families. Home health care on approval. Allergy/skin/disease/alopecia/laser (non-cosmetic). Pregnancy vitamins for deficiency only, 60 days newborn coverage under mother. Dental: all medical dental procedures as described. Artificial Limbs up to maximum. Medical/disposable supplies, repatriation of remains SAR 10,000. RTA, work injury coverage as specified.
